languages.text: Воцарившийся Ноль-Халиф привлекал миллионы паломников и даровал планете священный статус. Его сакральное вычисление продолжалось долгие века, и виднейшие мудрецы Механикус прибывали на мир, чтобы попытаться постичь его смысл.

The enthroned Null Caliph drew millions of pilgrims and granted the planet hallowed status. Its sacred calculation continued for centuries, and the foremost sages of the Adeptus Mechanicus travelled to the world so they could attempt to divine its meaning.
languages.original_text: Воцарившийся Ноль-Халиф привлекал миллионы паломников и даровал планете священный статус. Его сакральное вычисление продолжалось долгие века, и виднейшие мудрецы Механикус прибывали на мир, чтобы попытаться постичь его смысл.

traits.locale_text: The enthroned Null Caliph drew millions of pilgrims and granted the planet hallowed status. Its sacred calculation continued for centuries, and the foremost sages of the Mechanicus travelled to the world so they could attempt to divine its meaning.

The enthroned Null Caliph drew millions of pilgrims and granted the planet hallowed status. Its sacred calculation continued for centuries, and the foremost sages of the Mechanicus travelled to the world so they could attempt to divine its meaning.

The enthroned Null Caliph drew millions of pilgrims and granted the planet hallowed status. Its sacred calculation continued for centuries, and the foremost sages of the Mechanicus travelled to the world so they could attempt to divine its meaning.

The enthroned Null Caliph drew millions of pilgrims and granted the planet hallowed status. Its sacred calculation continued for centuries, and the foremost sages of the Adeptus Mechanicus travelled to the world so they could attempt to divine its meaning.

languages.text: 正式登基的虚无哈里发吸引了数以百万的朝圣者，它所在的行星也成为了圣地。它神圣的计算持续了几个世纪之久，机械修会无数最重要的贤者来到了这个世界，试图推测计算的含义。
languages.original_text: The enthroned Null Caliph drew millions of pilgrims and granted the planet hallowed status. Its sacred calculation continued for centuries, and the foremost sages of the Adeptus Mechanicus travelled to the world so they could attempt to divine its meaning.

traits.locale_text: 正式登基的虚无哈里发吸引了数以百万的朝圣者，它所在的行星也成为了圣地。它神圣的计算持续了几个世纪之久，机械修会无数最重要的贤者来到了这个世界，试图推测计算的含义。

languages.text: 即位したヌル・カリフは何百万もの巡礼者を引き寄せ、この星を神聖なものとした。聖なる計算は何世紀にもわたって続き、帝国技術局の一流の賢人たちはそれが意味するところを推測しようと惑星へ向けて旅立った。
languages.original_text: The enthroned Null Caliph drew millions of pilgrims and granted the planet hallowed status. Its sacred calculation continued for centuries, and the foremost sages of the Adeptus Mechanicus travelled to the world so they could attempt to divine its meaning.

traits.locale_text: 即位したヌル・カリフは何百万もの巡礼者を引き寄せ、この星を神聖なものとした。聖なる計算は何世紀にもわたって続き、帝国技術局の一流の賢人たちはそれが意味するところを推測しようと惑星へ向けて旅立った。

languages.text: Une fois intronisé, Null Caliph attira des millions de pèlerins et conféra à la planète le statut de lieu saint. Ses calculs sacrés se poursuivirent des siècles durant, et les plus éminents sages de l'Adeptus Mechanicus se rendirent sur le monde pour tenter d'en deviner le sens.
languages.original_text: The enthroned Null Caliph drew millions of pilgrims and granted the planet hallowed status. Its sacred calculation continued for centuries, and the foremost sages of the Adeptus Mechanicus travelled to the world so they could attempt to divine its meaning.

traits.locale_text: Une fois intronisé, Null Caliph attira des millions de pèlerins et conféra à la planète le statut de lieu saint. Ses calculs sacrés se poursuivirent des siècles durant, et les plus éminents sages de l'Adeptus Mechanicus se rendirent sur le monde pour tenter d'en deviner le sens.

languages.text: Null Caliph, desde su trono, atrajo a millones de peregrinos y otorgó al planeta la condición de sagrado. Su cálculo sagrado continuó durante siglos, y los sabios más avezados del Adeptus Mechanicus viajaron hasta el mundo para tratar de discernir su significado.
languages.original_text: The enthroned Null Caliph drew millions of pilgrims and granted the planet hallowed status. Its sacred calculation continued for centuries, and the foremost sages of the Adeptus Mechanicus travelled to the world so they could attempt to divine its meaning.

traits.locale_text: Null Caliph, desde su trono, atrajo a millones de peregrinos y otorgó al planeta la condición de sagrado. Su cálculo sagrado continuó durante siglos, y los sabios más avezados del Mechanicus viajaron hasta el mundo para tratar de discernir su significado.

languages.text: Null Caliph zog nach der Krönung Millionen von Pilgern an und verschaffte dem Planeten Heiligkeitsstatus. Seine heilige Berechnung ging noch Jahrhunderte weiter, und die bedeutendsten Weisen des Adeptus Mechanicus reisten zu der Welt, um seine Bedeutung zu erkennen.
languages.original_text: The enthroned Null Caliph drew millions of pilgrims and granted the planet hallowed status. Its sacred calculation continued for centuries, and the foremost sages of the Adeptus Mechanicus travelled to the world so they could attempt to divine its meaning.

traits.locale_text: Null Caliph zog nach der Krönung Millionen von Pilgern an und verschaffte dem Planeten Heiligkeitsstatus. Seine heilige Berechnung ging noch Jahrhunderte weiter, und die bedeutendsten Weisen des Mechanicus reisten zu der Welt, um seine Bedeutung zu erkennen.

languages.text: Tahta çıkarılan Hiçlik Halifesi, milyonlarca seyyahı kendine çekip gezegeni kutsal ilan etti. Gezegenin ilahi hesaplaması yüzyıllarca sürdü. Adeptus Mechanicus'un önde gelen âlimleri, dünyayı ziyaret ederek bu hesaplamanın anlamını çözmeye çalıştı.
languages.original_text: The enthroned Null Caliph drew millions of pilgrims and granted the planet hallowed status. Its sacred calculation continued for centuries, and the foremost sages of the Adeptus Mechanicus travelled to the world so they could attempt to divine its meaning.

traits.locale_text: Tahta çıkarılan Hiçlik Halifesi, milyonlarca seyyahı kendine çekti ve gezegeni kutsal ilan etti. İlahi hesaplaması yüzyıllar boyunca sürdü ve Adeptus Mechanicus'un önde gelen âlimleri dünyayı ziyaret ederek bu hesaplamanın anlamını çözmeye çalıştılar.
